Patients monitor natural cycle , stimulate cycle follow . In stimulated cycle patient randomize co-treatment aromatase inhibitor placebo ovarian stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Mapping Specific Factors That Determine Stimulation Ovaries Under Fertility Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim project explore putative cyclic recruitment 'gatekeeping ' function gonadotropin , sex steroid , anti-muellarian hormone pregnancy associate plasma protein A normal ovulatory cycle , impact ovarian stimulation cyclic follicle recruitment follow cycle . It propose supra-physiological level estradiol progesterone arise ovarian stimulation may modulate size secondarily recruit follicle cohort next cycle . In order explore relative contribution sex steroid determinant size next cycle 'wave ' recruitment , second aim study investigate whether limit rise sex steroid level ovarian stimulation , co-treatment aromatase inhibitor impact cyclic recruitment .
